        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3279</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Das Futur</string>
            <string language="es">Das Futur</string>
            <string language="ga">Das Futur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Futur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Das Futur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Das Futur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Das Futur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">DAS Futur</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet featuring a detailed outline (with examples) of the formation of the future tense in German.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que hace una descripción detallada (con ejemplos) de la formación del tiempo futuro en alemán.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre le himlíne sonrach (le samplaí) d’fhoirmiú na haimsire fháistinigh sa Ghearmáinis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">German</string>
            <string language="es">Alemán. Gramática/Grammatik. Notas</string>
            <string language="ga">Gearmáinis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Grammar/Grammatik</string>
            <string language="ga">Gramadach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Notes</string>
            <string language="ga">Nótaí</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen, der eine ausführliche umreiß kennzeichnet
(mit Beispielen) der Anordnung des Zukunfttempus auf Deutsch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau comportant un contour détaillé (avec des
exemples) de la formation du temps de futur en allemand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha que caracteriza um esboço detalhado (com 
exemplos) da formação do tempo do futuro no alemão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro che caratterizza un profilo 
dettagliato (con gli esempi) della formazione del tempo di futuro in 
tedesco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας που χαρακτηρίζει ένα λεπτομερές 
περίγραμμα (με τα παραδείγματα) του σχηματισμού του μελλοντικού 
χρόνου στα γερμανικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutsch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammar/Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
